alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana and northwestern Pearl River Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Varnado, or 9 miles north of Bogalusa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Varnado, Crossroads and Angie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
